Issue.creator: muralisr
Issue.description: https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/2581/ introduces some exported functions in peer/msgvalidation.go. These are excercised in ESCC unit tests, the endorser so its not totally terrible to not have a test case. As the code has already been rebased a few times, in the interest of avoiding more churn we could add the test case to be added after the merge. Creating this item to track that.
